lead_paragraph: Carlos Brathwaite struck four straight sixes in the last over of the World Twenty20 final to seal a thrilling four-wicket win for West Indies over England in Kolkata.
snippet: Carlos Brathwaite struck four straight sixes in the last over of the World Twenty20 final to seal a thrilling four-wicket win for West Indies over England in Kolkata.
abstract: West Indies defeats England to win 2016 cricket World Twenty20..
